languages.text: "Зная то, что мне известно о госпоже Чорда, я бы на твоем месте не веселился. Вольный Торговец — опасный противник".
"From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."
languages.original_text: "Зная то, что мне известно о госпоже Чорда, я бы на твоем месте не веселился. Вольный Торговец — опасный противник".

traits.locale_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果我是你的话，我恐怕不会高兴得手舞足蹈。根据我对库尔达女士的了解，这位行商浪人是位相当危险的对手。”
languages.original_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: “如果我是你的话，我恐怕不会高兴得手舞足蹈。根据我对库尔达女士的了解，这位行商浪人是位相当危险的对手。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « D'après ce que je sais de dame Chorda, vous ne devriez pas vous réjouir de la sorte. Les libres-marchands font de dangereux adversaires. »
languages.original_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: « D'après ce que je sais de dame Chorda, vous ne devriez pas vous réjouir de la sorte. Les libres-marchands font de dangereux adversaires. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Por lo que sé de lady Chorda, le recomendaría que no se frote las manos todavía. Esa Comerciante Independiente es una oponente muy peligrosa».
languages.original_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo que sé de lady Chorda, le recomendaría que no se frote las manos todavía. Esa Comerciante Independiente es una oponente muy peligrosa».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「レディ・チョーダを知っているが、俺なら、奴におべっかを使おうとは思わん。あの自由開拓者は危険な敵だ」
languages.original_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・チョーダを知っているが、俺なら、奴におべっかを使おうとは思わん。あの自由開拓者は危険な敵だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nach allem, was ich über Lady Chorda weiß, würde ich mir an Eurer Stelle nicht vor Freude die Hände reiben. Die Freihändlerin ist eine gefährliche Widersacherin."
languages.original_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: "Nach allem, was ich über Lady Chorda weiß, würde ich mir an Eurer Stelle nicht vor Freude die Hände reiben. Die Freihändlerin ist eine gefährliche Widersacherin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."

languages.text: "Leydi Chorda'yı tanıyorsam sevinçten ellerimi ovuşturacak bir durum olmadığını bilirim. Hür Tacir, tehlikeli bir rakiptir."
languages.original_text: "From what I know of Lady Chorda, I would not be rubbing my hands with glee if I were you. The Rogue Trader is a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Chorda'yı tanıyorsam sevinçten ellerimi ovuşturacak bir durum olmadığını bilirim. Hür Tüccar, tehlikeli bir rakiptir."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
